# Heightened Awareness (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, M/DF (a coffee bean)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 183

You enter a heightened state of awareness that allows you to notice more about your surroundings and recall information effortlessly. You gain a +2 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks and on all [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] checks that you are trained in. If this spell is active when you have to make an initiative check, you can instantly dismiss this spell and gain a +4 bonus on that check.
